# Objective-C Garbage Collection

**API Collection**

Interface with the legacy garbage collection system.

## Legacy

- **Memory Allocation Options**: Constants used to control behavior when allocating or reallocating collectible memory.

## Legacy

- **Distributed Objects Support**: Enable communication among objects in different processes, both locally and on remote systems.
